QuestData.Title: Not Just Any Body
QuestData.Description: We need Loramus Thalipedes, the demon hunter. He knows Razelikh's true name, and as you know: if you know the name of the demon, you have power over it. The problem is that Loramus has been killed, and his body torn apart.$b$bIf you bring me the pieces, we still have a recourse. All three pieces are in the west... the Dreadmaul ogres hide them in their caves. Move quickly, for much like Grimeo, Loramus also owes me a debt...
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Loramus' Head, Loramus' Torso, and Loramus' Legs.
QuestData.CompletionText: Trust me... whatever happened to Loramus, we can fix. The limits of blood magic are still undefined.
QuestData.RewardText: I see... yes, I can work with this.$b$b<Kasim looks at the night elf's head.>$b$bLoramus Thalipedes, demon hunter. I look forward to our reunion.
